sentences.en: A person or thing of unsurpassed excellence or beauty; a paragon.
sentences.cn: 殊品,完人,绝代佳人卓越无比的完美事物或美人; 完人.

sentences.en: A person or thing that has no equal; a paragon.
sentences.cn: 完美无比的人或物无比杰出的人或物; 完人.

sentences.en: He was considered to be a paragon of virtue.
sentences.cn: 他被认为是品德尽善尽美的典范.

sentences.en: He was not a paragon. He would never be perfect.
sentences.cn: 他不是完人，永远不可能十全十美。

sentences.en: I am sure she is a paragon of rectitude.
sentences.cn: 我可以肯定她是个正直的完人.

sentences.en: Is Confucius the paragon of Mount Tai?
sentences.cn: 孔子就是五岳独尊的泰山 吗 ?

sentences.en: It may be that, so placed, you - being the noble - minded paragon that you are - would behave unselfishly.
sentences.cn: 也许, 你是品德高尚的杰出人物,即使得到了那种位置, 你会表现得毫不自私.

sentences.en: Man is the paragon of animals.
Miss Costigan was a paragon of virtue and delicacy!
sentences.cn: 科斯蒂根小姐是一位高尚完美的天生尤物!

sentences.en: She is a paragon of virtue.
She was spoken of as a paragon of virtue.
sentences.cn: 人们都说她品德完美无瑕.

sentences.en: The ancient saying runs , " The man who of aa paragon of men. "
sentences.cn: 自古道: “ 识时务者为俊杰 ”.

sentences.en: The professor is a paragon of virtue and learning.
sentences.cn: 这位教授堪称为人师表.

sentences.en: There is an angel in the cave, or if not, an earthly paragon.
sentences.cn: 山洞里来了天使啦, 要不然, 也是世间少有的美少女.

sentences.en: Thus , professionalism is the core value of Paragon Investment Manager Inc.
sentences.cn: 知识的力量来自于商品化的能力!

sentences.en: We don't expect candidates to be paragons of virtue.
sentences.cn: 我们不指望候选人都是道德完人。

words.tran_cn: 模范；完美之物；优秀之人

trans.tran_cn: 模范，典型，十全十美的人，完美无缺的人
trans.tran_en: someone who is perfect or is extremely brave, good etc – often used humorously
